attributes.action: Stop cuts to charities - Double the funding instead.
attributes.additional_details:
With the recent riots it's clear that we have a large society of young people who have been misguided in life.
Charities especially youth groups and projects aimed at keeping young people off the streets and involved in drama, music, or training of some kind, help install hope and ambition to young people who may otherwise end up going down a criminal, life destructive paths.
With cuts these charities will close, when we clearly need more of these charities and projects not less. Stop cuts and increase funding, help stop the young people of England feeling helpless and unambitious, and resorting to acts such as these recent riots out of boredom and lack of respect for their communities
